overview:
Kwame Kuadey is an entrepreneur, gift card expert, and avid blogger. He is editor and publisher of Giftcardblogger.com, a popular blog about the gift card industry. Kwame has published several articles about the gift card industry and has been quoted in The New York Times, Washington Post, Columbus Dispatch, Des Moines Register, and many other mainstream press publications. He has also made appearances on National Public Radio and 6abc News in Philadelphia.

Kwame is Founder and CEO of GiftCardRescue.com, an online marketplace where visitors can buy, sell, or exchange unused gift cards. Prior to founding GiftCardRescue, he spent 7 years at Citigroup in various roles in Operations, Compliance, and HR.

A graduate of Middlebury College with a B.A. in economics, Kwame also holds an M.B.A. from the Johns Hopkins University Carey Business School.
